questions.question: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happened?

answers.answer: I was in holidays last year in morroco. I went there by plane and i come back by bus. With my cousin we went to the beach every day until the afternoon and we take a bath of sun. All evening we were doing tour by car and listening music it was so cool, we had enjoy a lot. We are now waiting for the next holiday we are going to MÃ¡laga !
